dt: {bc}peculiar susceptibility to a pleasurable or painful impression (as from praise or a slight)
{bc}awareness of and responsiveness toward something (such as emotion in another)
{bc}refined or excessive {a_link|sensitiveness} in emotion and taste with especial responsiveness to the pathetic

shortdef: peculiar susceptibility to a pleasurable or painful impression (as from praise or a slight) —often used in plural
awareness of and responsiveness toward something (such as emotion in another)
